tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Investment_Decisions (
    Decision_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Symbol VARCHAR(10),
    Trade_Type ENUM('Buy', 'Sell'),
    Quantity INT,
    Decision_Time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (Symbol) REFERENCES Market_Data(Symbol)
);

CREATE TABLE Stocks (
    symbol VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR,
    last_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT,
    market_cap DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
    investment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE StockQuotes (
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CompanyProfiles (
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    industry VARCHAR(50),
    founded_date DATE,
    ceo_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE InvestmentPortfolio (
    investor_id INT,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    shares INT,
    buy_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    investment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE NewsArticles (
    title VARCHAR(255),
    publish_date DATE,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MarketIndices (
    index_name VARCHAR(50),
    value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)
